function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High occupancy levels during start and end of class times","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to crowding","Mitigation":"Staggered start and end times, improved ventilation, and frequent cleaning","Technologies":"Automated scheduling systems, air purifiers, and UV disinfection","People":"Students, teachers, and staff","Owner":"School administration"},{"Description":"Unpredictable occupancy levels during class time","Impact":"Difficulty in monitoring and controlling disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Regular health screenings, flexible seating arrangements, and clear communication of health protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, movable partitions, and digital communication systems","People":"Students, teachers, and staff","Owner":"School administration"}]}
